decks.notes: The deck revolves around utilizing Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful and cost-efficient creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, and Torrential Gearhulk. The deck also includes energy-generating cards like Woodweaver's Puzzleknot and Harnessed Lightning to fuel Marvel activations and other abilities. With a mix of control elements like counterspells and card draw, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm opponents with high-impact threats. It's a high-risk, high-reward strategy that can lead to explosive plays and decisive victories.

The deck focuses on using Aetherworks Marvel to quickly ramp up and cheat out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. It also includes energy-generating cards like Woodweaver's Puzzleknot and Harnessed Lightning to power Marvel's ability. The deck aims to control the game with counterspells like Negate and Censor while generating card advantage with Glimmer of Genius and Rogue Refiner. Chandra, Flamecaller provides additional removal and token generation. The key strategy is to quickly assemble Marvel and overwhelm the opponent with big threats.

This Izzet Control deck focuses on maintaining control over the game through counterspells and removal spells while using card draw and powerful finishers like Torrential Gearhulk. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and outvalue them with efficient spells, ultimately winning through card advantage and powerful threats. With a balanced mix of removal, counterspells, and card draw, this deck is designed to handle a variety of threats and strategies, while slowly building up advantages and securing victory in the late game.

The main focus of this Mardu Aggro deck is to quickly build a board presence with efficient and aggressive creatures like Thraben Inspector, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Veteran Motorist. By utilizing vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan, as well as powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and deal damage quickly. Removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push help keep the opponent's board clear. The deck also has some versatility with cards like Archangel Avacyn and Pia Nalaar for added resilience and synergy.

The focus of this deck is to establish a strong board presence early on by utilizing cards that provide incremental advantage and generate value, such as Winding Constrictor and Walking Ballista. By applying pressure with efficient threats like Grim Flayer and Nissa, Voice of Zendikar, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of removal spells like Fatal Push and Never // Return allows the deck to control the board and pave the way for its aggressive creatures to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence and putting pressure on the opponent with fast and efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Heart of Kiran. It also utilizes removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Declaration in Stone to control the board and keep the opponent on the back foot. Additionally, cards like Archangel Avacyn and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provide powerful threats that can close out the game quickly. The mana base allows for consistent casting of spells and ensures the deck can operate smoothly throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up energy, establish control with counterspells and removal, and then use Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. It focuses on generating energy quickly and efficiently through cards like Woodweaver's Puzzleknot and Servant of the Conduit, while also maintaining board presence through creatures like Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner. With a mix of ramp, control, and powerful threats, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its powerful creatures and synergy.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive creatures that can quickly deal damage and take control of the board. By utilizing cards like Lord of the Accursed and Liliana's Mastery to pump up your creatures, as well as utilizing cards like Diregraf Colossus and Relentless Dead for added value, this Mono Black Aggro deck aims to establish board presence early and maintain pressure throughout the game. Additionally, removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push help to clear the way for your creatures to get in for damage.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively control the board with powerful creatures and removal spells. The deck aims to maintain a strong presence on the battlefield by utilizing cards like Grim Flayer, Tireless Tracker, and Winding Constrictor to generate card advantage and power up its creatures. By combining aggressive creatures with efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Dissenter's Deliverance, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents and maintain board control to secure victory.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures and utilizing +1/+1 counter synergies to overwhelm the opponent. By combining powerful cards like Winding Constrictor and Verdurous Gearhulk with creatures that benefit from counters like Longtusk Cub and Walking Ballista, the deck aims to apply pressure from the very start of the game. Additionally, cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner provide card advantage to ensure a steady stream of threats. With a balanced land base and removal spells like Fatal Push, the deck aims to maintain control while aggressively attacking the opponent.

The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing cards like Toolcraft Exemplar, Heart of Kiran, and Scrapheap Scrounger, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional threats and utility. The deck also features versatile removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the strategy focuses on speed, efficiency, and maintaining board presence to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up energy quickly using cards like Attune with Aether and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot to get Aetherworks Marvel into play. Once Aetherworks Marvel is online, the goal is to spin it to cheat Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger into play and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful abilities. The deck also includes some control elements like Negate and Censor to protect the combo pieces, as well as value cards like Rogue Refiner and Chandra, Flamecaller to generate card advantage and help control the board.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up energy using cards like Attune with Aether and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot, then use Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Chandra, Flamecaller to help control the board and handle opposing threats. Overall, the strategy revolves around generating and utilizing energy efficiently to overwhelm opponents with big creatures and versatile spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Aetherworks Marvel to cheat big creatures like Ulamog into play early. It includes cards like Attune with Aether and Rogue Refiner to help ramp up energy quickly. Whirler Virtuoso can create Thopter tokens to further gain energy and stabilize the board. Control elements like Harnessed Lightning and Censor help protect the combo pieces and deal with threats. Chandra, Flamecaller provides additional card draw and board control. Overall, the key strategy is to generate enough energy to activate Aetherworks Marvel and consistently cheat out powerful creatures to overwhelm the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes energy-generating cards like Woodweaver's Puzzleknot and Servant of the Conduit to help activate the marvel more quickly. The deck includes counterspells like Censor and Negate to protect the combo pieces and removal spells like Descend upon the Sinful to deal with threats. Glimmer of Genius and Rogue Refiner provide card draw to help find combo pieces and ensure a smooth gameplay.

The deck focuses on generating energy through cards like Woodweaver's Puzzleknot and Attune with Aether to power up Aetherworks Marvel. Once Aetherworks Marvel is activated, players can potentially cast Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger for a huge swing in momentum. The deck also includes control elements like Negate and Elder Deep-Fiend to disrupt opponent's game plan while maintaining a steady stream of energy production. Tireless Tracker and Whirler Virtuoso provide additional value through card draw and tokens, making this deck a versatile and powerful combo archetype.
